about.title: Frontend Developer
about.summary:
Frontend developer with good experience in Vue js (option and composition) , website layout and CMS setup.
The last two years I create commercial SPA web application and website layout, learning English and new technology in Frontend.
I had my own small company that developed websites and making corporate clients service in system administration and equipment maintenance.
I know how to work with large amount of data, can learn quickly. I have a good experience in keeping good relations and communications with customers and also, Iâ€™m responsible for deadlines and requirements accordance.
